applet.name: DarkFlatSkinInstaller
applet.title: Dark Flat Skin Installer
applet.desc: This applet installs the Dark Flat Skin for Squeezeplay (for 800 x 480 resolution, based on JogglerSkin). More information, screenshots and FAQ on https://github.com/AF-1 Windows and Linux users: please read the FAQ BEFORE installing.
applet.creator: AF

applet.name: DarkFlatSkinInstaller
applet.title: Dark Flat Skin Installer
applet.desc: This applet installs the Dark Flat Skins on your piCorePlayer (for 800 x 480 resolution, based on JogglerSkin). More information, screenshots and FAQ on https://github.com/AF-1
applet.creator: AF

applet.name: DarkFlatSkinInstaller
applet.title: Dark Flat Skin Installer
applet.desc: This applet installs the Dark Flat Skin on your SB Touch (based on WQVGAsmallSkin). More information, screenshots and FAQ on https://github.com/AF-1. See FAQ for information on known SB Touch issue.
applet.creator: AF

applet.name: NPwithRatingsInstaller
applet.title: NowPlaying Screen with Ratings Installer
applet.desc: This applet installs a NowPlaying screen with ratings on your SB Radio (for QVGAlandscapeSkin). More information on https://github.com/AF-1
applet.creator: AF

plugin.name: AlternativePlayCount
plugin.title: Alternative Play Count
plugin.desc: Provides alternative play counts and skip counts that aim to reflect your true listening history. You set a time after which a song counts as played. If you skip the song before, it counts as skipped, not played. Use the data with other plugins to create/play smart playlists, virtual libraries or to skip specific tracks.
Fournit un nombre de lectures et de sauts alternatif qui vise à refléter votre vrai historique de lecture. Définissez une durée après laquelle un morceau est considéré comme joué.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: CustomSkip3
plugin.title: Custom Skip
plugin.desc: Set player-specific rules for when the current track or upcoming tracks in your client playlist should be skipped and removed from the playlist automatically.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: CustomStartStopTimes
plugin.title: Custom Start Stop Times
plugin.desc: Start and stop tracks at a specific playback time or skip a specific part of the song (e.g. silence) by simply adding custom start, stop or skip times to a track's comments tag.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: CustomTagImporter
plugin.title: Custom Tag Importer
plugin.desc: Scans track information from custom tags in your music files (incl. rating tags).
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: DarkDefaultSkin
plugin.title: Dark Default Skin
plugin.desc: Dark-themed version of the LMS Default skin.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: DynamicPlaylists4
plugin.title: Dynamic Playlists
plugin.desc: Use smart playlists (dynamic playlists) to play continuous music mixes based on your selection criteria.
Jouez des mix continus de musique basés sur des critères de sélection définis dans les listes de lecture dynamiques.
Nutze intelligente/dynamische Wiedergabelisten, um kontinuierliche Wiedergabelisten basierend auf deinen Selektionskriterien zu erstellen.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: DynamicPlaylistCreator
plugin.title: Dynamic Playlist Creator
plugin.desc: Helps you create custom smart playlists (dynamic playlists) for the Dynamic Playlists plugin using templates.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: RatingsLight
plugin.title: Ratings Light
plugin.desc: Set, import, export, log, backup and restore track ratings. Create virtual libraries for (top) rated tracks with browse menus.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: VirtualLibraryCreator
plugin.title: Virtual Library Creator
plugin.desc: Create custom virtual libraries with optional LMS browse menus using a template in a browser or by adding files with customized SQLite statements.
plugin.creator: AF

plugin.name: VisualStatistics
plugin.title: Visual Statistics
plugin.desc: Have a look at your library statistics with charts.
Explorez les statistiques de votre librairie avec des graphiques.
Bekijk jouw mediabibliotheek statistieken door middel van grafieken.
plugin.creator: AF
